
*Embedded Technological Features having moral implications*

| Transparent Features | Morally Opaque Features |

Morally Opaque Features: 
  * _Known Features_
  * Users are aware of these features but do not realise they have moral implications
  * Examples can include web forms or search engine tools
   
Unkown Features:
  * Users are not even aware of the technological features that have moral implications. 
    Examples might include data-mining
